Overview  Package  Class   Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
Cougaar 12.7
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Uses of Package
org.cougaar.mts.base

Packages that use org.cougaar.mts.base
org.cougaar.core.qos.gossip The Gossip subsystem allows Metrics collected on one Node to be disseminated to other Nodes in the society. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.tmatrix   
org.cougaar.mts.base This package contains the core software components and infrastructure for the full Message Transport Service, including interceptor Stations, base classes, MTS services, mandatory Aspects, and loopback LinkProtocol. 
org.cougaar.mts.corba This package contains the software components needed for the CORBA Link Protocol. 
org.cougaar.mts.http This package contains the software components needed for the HTTP and HTTPS Link Protocols. 
org.cougaar.mts.jms   
org.cougaar.mts.rmi This package contains the RMI and RMI-SSL link protocols. 
org.cougaar.mts.std This package contains optional MTS software components that are used for a production Cougaar runtime. 
org.cougaar.mts.std.debug This package contains optional MTS components used for debugging and testing Cougaar internals. 
org.cougaar.mts.std.experimental This package contains experimental MTS software components that extend the behavior of the MTS. 
org.cougaar.mts.stream   
org.cougaar.mts.udp   
org.cougaar.mts.xmpp   
 

Classes in org.cougaar.mts.base used by org.cougaar.core.qos.gossip
BoundComponent
          Root class of Components of the MTS.
MessageTransportAspect
          Abstract specification of a aspect in the message transport subsystem.
StandardAspect
          Default base Aspect class.
 

Classes in org.cougaar.mts.base used by org.cougaar.core.qos.tmatrix
AttributedMessage
          An AttributedMessage is a Message with metadata, the latter represented as HashMap with String keys.
BoundComponent
          Root class of Components of the MTS.
CommFailureException
          This Exception indicates a DestinationLink general communications failure.
DestinationLink
          The fifth station for outgoing messages.
DestinationLinkDelegateImplBase
          Convenience class for aspects which define DestinationLink delegate classes.
MessageDeliverer
          The first or second station for an outgoing message on the receive side is a MessageDeliverer (first if no serialization, second otherwise).
MessageDelivererDelegateImplBase
          Convenience class for aspects which define MessageDeliverer delegate classes.
MessageTransportAspect
          Abstract specification of a aspect in the message transport subsystem.
MisdeliveredMessageException
          This Exception is thrown when the message is delivered to a Node that does not contain the target Agent, probably because the agent has moved.
NameLookupException
          This Exception generally indicates a failed call to the White Pages from within the MTS.
StandardAspect
          Default base Aspect class.
UnregisteredNameException
          This Exception indicates a type of Link Protocol failure and it is thrown when the destination address specified could not be obtained from the Name Lookup Service i.e destination address is not created yet.
 

Classes in org.cougaar.mts.base used by org.cougaar.mts.base
AbstractLinkSelectionPolicy
          An abstract base implementation of LinkSelectionPolicy which handles the registration through the LinkSelectionProvisionService.
AspectFactory
          The root class of all aspect-ready factories.
AspectSupport
          This is an MTS-internal utility service which supports the use of aspects.
AttributedMessage
          An AttributedMessage is a Message with metadata, the latter represented as HashMap with String keys.
BoundComponent
          Root class of Components of the MTS.
CommFailureException
          This Exception indicates a DestinationLink general communications failure.
CougaarIOException
          Parent class of COUGAAR-specific IOExceptions.
DestinationLink
          The fifth station for outgoing messages.
DestinationQueue
          The fourth station for an outgoing message is a DestinationQueue.
DestinationQueueMonitorService
          This is an MTS-internal service, accessible only to child components of the MTS, that allows those components to examine the state of any given DestinationQueue.
DestinationQueueProviderService
          This is the factory service for getting a queue for a given destination.
DontRetryException
          This kind of IOException should be thrown if the receiving node wants to indicate to the sending Node that it should not retry sending a given message even though that message failed to be delivered.
LinkProtocol
          The parent class of all Link Protocols.
LinkProtocolService
          Abstract layer for interacting with a LinkProtocol as a service
LinkSelectionPolicy
          The selection of a DestinationLink is handled by this MTS-internal service, which is accessible only to MTS components.
MessageDeliverer
          The first or second station for an outgoing message on the receive side is a MessageDeliverer (first if no serialization, second otherwise).
MessageReader
          This is the first station in the receiver for serializling LinkProtocols.
MessageStreamsFactory
          This factory is used to create MessageReaders and MessageWriters with a specific list of Aspects.
MessageTransportAspect
          Abstract specification of a aspect in the message transport subsystem.
MessageTransportRegistryService
          This is a utility/bookkeeping service for the MTS.
MessageWriter
          This is the final station in the sender for serializling LinkProyocols.
MisdeliveredMessageException
          This Exception is thrown when the message is delivered to a Node that does not contain the target Agent, probably because the agent has moved.
NameLookupException
          This Exception generally indicates a failed call to the White Pages from within the MTS.
NameSupport
          This utility service hides the grimy details of dealing with NameServers and White Pages from the rest of the message transport subsystem.
QueueListener
          This interface describes the queue events for which listeners can be notifified via callback.
QueueProviderService
          Generic service specialized by DestinationQueueProviderService and SendQueueProviderService.
ReceiveLink
          The final station in the message transport system before an incoming message is delivered to an Agent.
ReceiveLinkProviderService
          This is the factory service for getting a ReceiveLink for a given destination.
Router
          The third station for an outgoing message.
SendLink
          SendLink is the first station after the MessageTransportService implementation class.
SendQueue
          The second station for an outgoing message is a SendQueue.
SendQueueProviderService
          This is the factory service for getting a queue for a given sender.
SocketControlPolicy
          This interface is a simple version of pluggable control over network sockets.
SocketFactory
          This is an RMISocketFactory that can wrap ServerSockets and apply Aspect delegates to client Sockets.
StandardAspect
          Default base Aspect class.
UnregisteredNameException
          This Exception indicates a type of Link Protocol failure and it is thrown when the destination address specified could not be obtained from the Name Lookup Service i.e destination address is not created yet.
